Positive: In regards to coronavirus, I am also preparing myself to fight nature against nature. I have paid attention to the geography of where it has had heaviest impacts and lightest impacts, and have noticed the heavier impacts have been in arid or urban areas. So, I'm going to garden.
Negative: Another reason surrounding the coronavirus I am going to garden this season, is because of the impact that this thing is having on economies/distribution cycles. Many products will be gone when warehouses run out, and we may not deal w/ countries we get them from for a long time.
